about_the_game:
Embark on a mysterious Action Adventure as Yellow Punnu, a radiant explorer in search of the missing Green Punnu. Traverse four intriguing planets with five enigmatic maps each, facing haunting challenges armed only with a glowing heart.

Key Features in Glowpop:

  • Mysteriously Brutal Adventure
  • Elegantly Beautiful Art Style
  • Explore 4 Unique Planets, each with 5 Enigmatic Maps
  • Uncover the Colorful Rainbow Glitter Splatter

    In a visually stunning universe, beware of dangers like spikes, acid, and more. Join Yellow Punnu and companions Blue and Red Punnu as they piece together the puzzle of Green's disappearance, revealing an epic danger threatening the entire universe.

    Test your skills, decode mysteries, and confront impending peril.
    Wishlist now for an Out-Of-This-World adventure!

    Want to give feedback, support or report bugs?
    Join our discord!


    Help us develop the game even better, give feedback here!

short_description: Glowpop is an action Adventure starring a little alien explorer, The Yellow Punnu. Travel to new planets and uncover the epic story of a missing friend. Engage in challenging but rewarding gameplay & experience a visually stunning art style with no combat and your only defence: a glowing heart.
